extendedInfo.description: The Best finger-sliding jewels elimination game on android market.Are you a super fan of diamend or bejeweled style games? Are you tired of the monotonous scene and the same playing method of the classic jewels-elimination games but you still can't help enjoying it!Slide your finger to create chains of three or more jewels until a gorgeous star comes down. Keep linking jewels to make the star fall down to win the game. Come on! Letâs begin the journey of treasure hunting â JewelsLink, the latest FREE game from Ezjoy Network, makers of Bubble Pop Plusï¼Jewels Maze and Marble Blast!Highlighted Featuresï¼1. Well-designed levels, easy to learn but hard to master.2. Beautiful and glorious scenes.3. Lots of mysterious items make the game more interesting and exciting.If you like this game, please rate it and recommend to your friends.Thanks for playing!

reviews.title: Jewel link
reviews.comment: Love it, love it!!  It\' so additive really enjoy this game fun!!
reviews.author: Angela Curry

reviews.comment: Wake up playing the game! But never could get pass 99. Didn\'t have anymore coins.!!! All that work for that disappointment?! How do I get more coins?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this game, nice variation on the usual match 3 type games, very addictive, well done!!!
reviews.author: Sharron Austin

reviews.title: This is fun
reviews.comment: Very addictive. Make sure to read directions to get the most out of it. First 5 star for me ever!
reviews.author: Kurt Sadowski

reviews.title: Good to pass the time
reviews.comment: Really good game. Get carried away sometimes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Addictive game. It would be good to include an introduction on how to play for newbies. I was playing the same level for the longest time, didn\'t know I could unlock with coins.
reviews.author: Iris Chong

reviews.title: Addicted
reviews.comment: Addicted game. ... And im waiting for the update. ... More level pleaseee....
reviews.author: rhei abbie

reviews.title: Very addicting
reviews.comment: I found this game as a fluck and love it.  Took a few times to figure out the goal but now I just wasn\'t to near the level. Using my Samsung tablet no glitches at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun fun fun
reviews.comment: I like all the jewels made by this guy. Two suggestions: combine these games into one awesome app, make the game put my next level on top so I don\'t have to scroll and scroll.
reviews.author: Todd Starbuck

reviews.title: Excellent twist on a classic genre
reviews.comment: An enjoyable variation on gem matching games. Easy to play while still challenging. Good visuals and music. Becoming a favorite game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I am a Jewels Maze fanatic, then found this!! Really fun ...thanks Ezjoy
reviews.author: Anna Stellman

reviews.title: You should give coins daily
reviews.comment: I love this game i am so good at it it looks hard but it is super esey :).
reviews.author: Makayla Norby

reviews.comment: I play a lot of jewel games. This one is great
reviews.author: Todd Steffens

reviews.title: Arnold Samsung tablet
reviews.comment: It\'s a clean , vibrant, and exciting game that will keep you going for hours , try it you won\'t regret it, you\'ll love it........
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Starts out EASY but as you go up in levels starts to get interesting. Really nice game to pass time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Great game, would be 5 stars if once you gave coins to unlock a level it stayed unlocked even if you don\'t win the first time. So you have to go back to lower levels if you don\'t pass the first time to collect more coins.
reviews.author: Lisa Teaney

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: If u r bored it a way to pass time,they need to, update the software
reviews.author: Lakeitha Williams

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: Terrific family game! Addictive,  fun, and easy to play. Challenging but easy at the same time.
reviews.author: Marsha Parker-Mizell

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: You claim coins on one ge and can\'t claim on others, stupid, 5 if they fix that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Incredible S
reviews.comment: Very nice. But why only one category game? Wouldn\'t survive with others, comparatively.
reviews.author: Nipun Mitra
